com.teamten.math

Class Complex

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamten.math.Complex

  • public class Complex
extends Object
    An immutable object representing a complex number and its operations.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Complex UNITY
      The Complex value 1.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Complex(double re, double im)
      Creates an immutable complex number with the specified real and imaginary components.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Complex add(Complex other)
      Returns the sum of this and the other complex number.
      double argument()
      Returns the argument of this complex number, i.e., the counterclockwise angle around the complex origin starting at the positive real axis.
      Complex conjugate()
      Returns the conjugate of this number (only imaginary part negated).
      Complex divide(Complex other)
      Returns the quotient of this number and the other, in other words, this divided by other.
      Complex divide(double other)
      Returns the quotient of this number and a scalar.
      Complex exp()
      Returns e raised to this complex number.
      static Complex fromPhasor(double modulus, double argument)
      Creates a new complex number from the phasor (modulus and argument), where: modulus*e^(argument*i) = modulus*(cos(argument) + i*sin(argument))
      double im()
      Returns the imaginary part of this complex number.
      Complex log()
      Returns the log of this complex number.
      double modulus()
      Returns the modulus of this complex number, i.e., the distance from the number to the complex origin.
      Complex multiply(Complex other)
      Returns the product of this number and the other.
      Complex multiply(double other)
      Returns the product of this number and a scalar.
      Complex negate()
      Returns the negation of this number.
      Complex pow(double N)
      Returns this number to the Nth power.
      double re()
      Returns the real part of this complex number.
      Complex reciprocal()
      Returns the reciprocal of this number.
      Complex root(int N)
      Returns the principal Nth root of this number.
      Complex subtract(Complex other)
      Returns the difference of this and the other complex number, in other words, this minus other.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public Complex(double re,

    • Method Detail

      • fromPhasor

        public static Complex fromPhasor(double modulus,
                                 double argument)
        Creates a new complex number from the phasor (modulus and argument), where: modulus*e^(argument*i) = modulus*(cos(argument) + i*sin(argument))

      • re

        public double re()
        Returns the real part of this complex number.

      • im

        public double im()
        Returns the imaginary part of this complex number.

      • modulus

        public double modulus()
        Returns the modulus of this complex number, i.e., the distance from the number to the complex origin.

      • argument

        public double argument()
        Returns the argument of this complex number, i.e., the counterclockwise angle around the complex origin starting at the positive real axis. Always returns a value between -pi and pi.

      • add

        public Complex add(Complex other)
        Returns the sum of this and the other complex number.

      • subtract

        public Complex subtract(Complex other)
        Returns the difference of this and the other complex number, in other words, this minus other.

      • negate

        public Complex negate()
        Returns the negation of this number.

      • conjugate

        public Complex conjugate()
        Returns the conjugate of this number (only imaginary part negated).

      • reciprocal

        public Complex reciprocal()
        Returns the reciprocal of this number.

      • multiply

        public Complex multiply(Complex other)
        Returns the product of this number and the other.

      • multiply

        public Complex multiply(double other)
        Returns the product of this number and a scalar.

      • divide

        public Complex divide(Complex other)
        Returns the quotient of this number and the other, in other words, this divided by other.

      • divide

        public Complex divide(double other)
        Returns the quotient of this number and a scalar.

      • exp

        public Complex exp()
        Returns e raised to this complex number.

      • log

        public Complex log()
        Returns the log of this complex number.

      • root

        public Complex root(int N)
        Returns the principal Nth root of this number.

      • pow

        public Complex pow(double N)
        Returns this number to the Nth power.
